review: Dr. Santosh kumar (Pediatrician) one of the most compassionate, empathetic doctor . We visited him for my 1st baby because she had constipation problem. He helped a lot for us.we are blessed to get such a doctor and also very friendly.I delivered my 2nd baby 21st night 9.41. He is there at the time of delivery to take care of my baby. He regularly visited us in the hospital until we got discharged. He suggested some syrups and vaccine to my new born. Thank you so much sir for your concern. He is very down to earth.I recommend Dr. Santosh Kumar to all the folks.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Myself and my wife very very thankful to Dr.Santhosh Kumar. He helped a lot for us. We are blessed to get a wonderful human being and he is also friendly. Thank you very much sir for all the help done very quickly.
